pullrequest.title: updating to new ros key using PGP block format

content.raw:
I made this change and it worked. Is it better practice to store the `.key` files or do something like this?

```
RUN wget -P /tmp/ http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo.key
RUN wget -P /tmp/ http://packages.ros.org/ros.key
# COPY docker/keys/gazebo.key /tmp/gazebo.key
# COPY docker/keys/ros.key /tmp/ros.key
```
content.html:
I made this change and it worked. Is it better practice to store the .key files or do something like this?

RUN wget -P /tmp/ http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo.key
RUN wget -P /tmp/ http://packages.ros.org/ros.key
# COPY docker/keys/gazebo.key /tmp/gazebo.key
# COPY docker/keys/ros.key /tmp/ros.key
